thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 38 of 7163
thread.title: Evan Tow
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Evan Tow

author: Evan Tow
title: Evan Tow
text: From computers, to electronics, there is no better store anywhere. The selection is practically overwhelming, the pricing competitive, and there is no sales tax or delivery charge if your order exceeds $50. Returns are easy and simple. If I am in New York, B and H is on my list of tourist visits sites. It is the "Toys R Us" for adults. If the store was open 24 hours, I am sure that I would be there just looking at all of the high quality camera, video, and electronic equipment that are on display. Except I would have to have a truck to pick up everything that I bought.
